markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Musetouched](/Feats.aspx?ID=4546) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
<trait label="Nephilim" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=518" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 79 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

Your blood sings with the liberating power of the [azatas](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=10), living embodiments of freedom from the wild realm of [Elysium](/Planes.aspx?ID=16). You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79). When you roll a critical failure on a check to Escape, you get a failure instead, and when you roll a success, you get a critical success instead.
name: Musetouched

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 1" pfs="Standard" > Musetouched Source Player Core pg. 79 2.0 --- Your blood sings with the liberating power of the azatas, living embodiments of freedom from the wild realm of Elysium. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Escape. When you roll a critical failure on a check to Escape, you get a failure instead, and when you roll a success, you get a critical success instead.
